refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: CMS_ContentInfo *d2i_CMS_ContentInfo(CMS_ContentInfo **a, unsigned char **pp, long length); int i2d_CMS_ContentInfo(CMS_ContentInfo *a, unsigned char **pp);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: These functions decode and encode an CMS ContentInfo structure.
Otherwise they behave in a similar way to d2i_X509() and i2d_X509() described in the d2i_X509 3 manual page.
